InteractionParticipant.name: InteractionParticipant
InteractionParticipant.description: Represents a user or User Group with whom the interaction is shared.

InteractionId.description: The call report that's shared with this user.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this participant is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the call report participant.

ParticipantId.description: The user or group that the call report is shared with.

ParticipantRoleId.description: The role assigned to this participant.
